roleset.name: (cause to become) the color red
roleset.note: REDDEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'redden' based on sentences in wsj. Member of VNcls other_cos-45.4. (from redden.01-v)

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is red

example.name: redden-v: unaccusative
example.text: Often the genteel, conservative, long-term-oriented investment bankers were displaced by crude traders: ``When angered, he cursedso forcefully that his face reddened and his pale-blue eyesnarrowed into tiny slits,'' the authors say of Lehman's LewisGlucksman.

example.name: redden-v: agentive
example.text: John reddened his cheeks to look younger.

roleset.name: be the color red
roleset.note: RED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl, redden.01. (from red.01-j)

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is red

example.name: red-j: arg1
example.text: Skin : stage two pressure ulcer of coccyx , bilateral involvement of the buttocks , it is red and blanchable

example.name: red-j: arg1
example.text: Skin : stage two pressure ulcer of coccyx , bilateral involvement of the buttocks , it is red and blanchable

roleset.name: slightly/somewhat red
roleset.note: REDDISH-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl. (from reddish.01-j)

example.name: reddish-j
example.text: He noticed his stools were " reddish . "
